ai_judge: your journey to self-awareness starts here
frontpage_ai_notice: reflect on your day and discover patterns in your emotions
error_occured: An error occurred. Please try again.
cant_submit_future: can't submit your mood for the future
privacyPolicy_intro: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our service.
privacyPolicy_section_1_item_1: Account Information: Email, username, and profile data (via Google/GitHub OAuth)
privacyPolicy_section_1_item_2: Usage Data: Mood entries, diary notes, emotional advice history
privacyPolicy_section_1_item_3: Technical Data: IP addresses, device information, cookies for authentication
privacyPolicy_section_1_item_4: Third-Party Integrations: Google/GitHub user data (limited to profile/email)
privacyPolicy_section_2_item_1: To provide personalized emotional analysis and advice
privacyPolicy_section_2_item_2: To authenticate and secure your account
privacyPolicy_section_3_item_1: All data is stored securely in PostgreSQL databases
privacyPolicy_section_3_item_3: JWT tokens are used for secure authentication
privacyPolicy_section_4_item_1: We retain your data until you delete your account
privacyPolicy_section_4_item_2: Deleted data is permanently removed within 30 days
privacyPolicy_section_4_item_3: Backup systems follow strict encryption protocols
privacyPolicy_section_5_item_1: Access/modify your data via your profile settings
privacyPolicy_section_5_item_2: Request data deletion by contacting support
privacyPolicy_section_5_item_3: Revoke third-party access in your account settings
privacyPolicy_section_5_item_4: Opt-out of data collection at any time (service limitations may apply)
privacyPolicy_section_6_item_1: Google/GitHub APIs governed by their respective privacy policies
privacyPolicy_section_6_item_2: No data sold to third parties
privacyPolicy_section_6_item_3: Service providers bound by confidentiality agreements
privacyPolicy_section_7_text: We'll notify you of material changes via email or in-app notifications.
privacy_policy_notice: By using this service, you agree to our Privacy Policy.
